chunks.text: Gotta take the time to take a look around us at what is yours and what is mine.
You've lived and worked in this land.
Those precious things worth saving, I'm waiting to be seen.
There's nowhere on the smother earth that's got so much together.
You've got to get up now, go there, make it last forever.
New Zealand is yours. Maybe you've lived in this beautiful country all your life
Now is the time to change that.

text: We're in God's own country. Gotta take the time to take a look around us at what is yours and what is mine. You've lived and worked in this land. You've helped it grow green. Those precious things worth saving, I'm waiting to be seen. There's nowhere on the smother earth that's got so much together. You've got to get up now, go there, make it last forever. New Zealand is yours. Maybe you've lived in this beautiful country all your life and never really seen it. Now is the time to change that. New Zealand is yours. Go there now.
